prompts: Create a robotic Pokemon with a sleek purple design and red accents that can transform.
I want an advanced Bug-type Pokemon with metallic features and a futuristic look.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a high-tech insect, complete with antennae and glowing elements.
Make a Pokemon that combines both Bug and Steel types with an emphasis on agility and technology.
Imagine a powerful Pokemon with a bipedal stance and sharp, mechanical claws ready for battle.
Design a legendary Pokemon with a cybernetic appearance and unique abilities related to technology.
Show me a Pokemon whose body resembles a blend of a bug and a battle mech.
